oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Elkmont postcard
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Postcard of little boy at Wonderland Hotel, Elkmont, Great Smoky Mountains. RPPC. Written on back: Newest Appalachian Club member at Wonderland Hotel stairs. Elkmont, Tenn. Little Eddie. [1915] (date supplied by seller).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Children; Portraits; Great Smoky Mountains; Clubs; Elkmont; Postcards;
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Postcard Collection>Great Smoky Mountains National Park>Elkmont
